wikipedia_page.main: Tom Black (born 11 October 1962) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for Airdrie, St Mirren, Kilmarnock and Stranraer. Black played as a left back and scored many goals as the team's free-kick and penalty taker.

response: *Tom Black (author) (born 1959), American entrepreneur and wine collector
*Tom Black (speedway rider) (born 1940), former motorcycle speedway rider from New Zealand
